channel.title: OOD on Bohdan Stupak's blog
channel.description: Recent content in OOD on Bohdan Stupak's blog

item.title: Dynamic polymorphism: key concept to master OOP
item.description: The world of object-oriented programming is a bit confusing. It requires mastering a lot of things: SOLID principles, design patterns to name a few. This gives birth to a lot of discussions: are design patterns still relevant, is SOLID intended solely for object-oriented code? It is said that one should prefer composition to inheritance but what is the exact rule of thumb when one should choose one or another?
